attributes.action: Hold an immediate Vote of No Confidence in H.M. Government.
attributes.additional_details: The current administration was elected on specific manifesto pledges which have been abandoned. They are now pursuing unmandated policies that are causing severe economic instability and threatening a deep recession. The social contract between the Government and the electorate is broken. Parliament must act to hold the Executive to account. The public deserves a General Election to choose who leads the country through this crisis.
attributes.background: ​We call on the House of Commons to schedule a debate and vote on a motion of no confidence. The Government has abandoned its manifesto commitments and is pursuing damaging economic policies without a mandate. Parliament must now test if the Government still holds the confidence of the House.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
